title: Practical Multimedia Utilization Training with a Graphic Focus for Current Engineers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering knowledge and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Construction of a graphic-centered educational environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can compare various graphic multimedia types (diagrams, animations, simulations) to analyze effective information delivery methods.
Learners can improve their ability to create and present technical documents using graphic materials through project-based tasks.
Learners can refine graphic content utilization strategies by incorporating formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
